title: Introduction_to_CardioDataSets
text: CardioDataSets package offers diverse collection datasets focused heart cardiovascular research. covers topics heart disease, myocardial infarction, heart failure, aortic dissection, cardiovascular risk factors, clinical outcomes, drug effects, mortality trends. package designed researchers, clinicians, epidemiologists, data scientists. includes clinical, epidemiological, simulated, real-world datasets enable exploration disease progression, treatment efficacy, cardiovascular risk, patient outcomes across various populations contexts. package supports analysis understanding cardiovascular risk, treatment efficacy, disease progression across various patient cohorts clinical contexts.

title: Introduction_to_CardioDataSets
text: dataset CardioDataSets package uses suffix denote type R object: _df: data frame _tbl_df: tibble _ts: time series _mtc_network: network meta-analysis _matrix: matrix

title: Introduction_to_CardioDataSets
text: selected example datasets included CardioDataSets package: heartdisease_tbl_df: Heart Disease Patients Clinical Data. cardioRiskFactors_df: Cardiovascular Risk Factors. emotion_heartrate_df: Study investigating recalling anger affects heart rate.

previous_headings: Introduction > Data Visualization with CardioDataSets Data
what: Distribution of Age in Heart Disease Patients
title: Introduction_to_CardioDataSets
code: # Age density plot by heart disease status and sex  ggplot(heartdisease_tbl_df, aes(x = Age, fill = HeartDisease)) +   geom_density(alpha = 0.7) +   facet_wrap(~Sex, labeller = labeller(Sex = c("1" = "Male", "0" = "Female"))) +   labs(title = "Age Distribution by Heart Disease Status and Sex",        x = "Age (years)",        y = "Density",        caption = "Data: Heart Disease Dataset") +   theme_minimal() +   theme(legend.position = "bottom",         plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", hjust = 0.5),         strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", size = 12))

previous_headings: Introduction > Data Visualization with CardioDataSets Data
what: Systolic Blood Pressure (sys) vs LDL Cholesterol (ldl), colored by Smoking status (smok)
title: Introduction_to_CardioDataSets
code: # Cardio risk factors: Blood pressure - cholesterol  ggplot(cardioRiskFactors_df, aes(x = ldl, y = sys, color = factor(smok))) +   geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +   labs(     title = "Systolic Blood Pressure vs LDL Cholesterol",     x = "LDL Cholesterol (mg/dL)",     y = "Systolic Blood Pressure (mmHg)",     color = "Smoking\nStatus (0 = No, 1 = Yes)"   ) +   theme_minimal()

previous_headings: Introduction > Data Visualization with CardioDataSets Data
what: Heart Rate Change from Baseline to Anger State
title: Introduction_to_CardioDataSets
code: ggplot(emotion_heartrate_df, aes(x = HR_baseline, y = HR_anger)) +   geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.7, color = "#E41A1C") +  # Red points   geom_abline(intercept = 0, slope = 1, linetype = "dashed", color = "gray40") +  # Reference line   labs(title = "Heart Rate Change from Baseline to Anger State",        x = "Baseline Heart Rate (bpm)",        y = "Anger State Heart Rate (bpm)") +   theme_minimal() +   theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"))

title: Introduction_to_CardioDataSets
text: CardioDataSets package provides valuable curated set datasets cardiovascular research. supports advanced statistical analysis, exploratory data science, teaching purposes offering structured well-documented datasets across range cardiovascular domains.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Renzo Caceres Rossi. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Caceres Rossi R (2025). CardioDataSets: Comprehensive Collection Cardiovascular Heart Disease Datasets. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/lightbluetitan/cardiodatasets.
code: @Manual{,   title = {CardioDataSets: A Comprehensive Collection of Cardiovascular and Heart Disease Datasets},   author = {Renzo {Caceres Rossi}},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/lightbluetitan/cardiodatasets}, }

what: A Comprehensive Collection of Cardiovascular and Heart Disease Datasets
title: A Comprehensive Collection of Cardiovascular and Heart Disease Datasets
text: CardioDataSets package offers diverse collection datasets focused heart cardiovascular research. covers topics heart disease, myocardial infarction, heart failure, aortic dissection, cardiovascular risk factors, clinical outcomes, drug effects, mortality trends. package designed researchers, clinicians, epidemiologists, data scientists. includes clinical, epidemiological, simulated, real-world datasets enable exploration disease progression, treatment efficacy, cardiovascular risk, patient outcomes across various populations contexts.

title: A Comprehensive Collection of Cardiovascular and Heart Disease Datasets

code: # Load the package  library(CardioDataSets)  # List all datasets in the package  view_datasets()  # Load dataset  data("heartdisease_tbl_df")  # Preview the dataset  head(heartdisease_tbl_df)  # Open in Viewer  View(heartdisease_tbl_df)

title: Acute Coronary Syndrome (ACS) Patient Data — acs_patients_df

what: Statins for Heart Failure Prevention — hfPrevention_mtc_network
title: Statins for Heart Failure Prevention — hfPrevention_mtc_network
text: dataset, hfPrevention_mtc_network, contains network meta-analysis data 19 trials comparing statins versus placebo usual care cholesterol lowering heart failure. main outcome measured number deaths. Trials categorized either primary prevention (previous heart disease) secondary prevention (previous heart disease).
